stdout:
Table	Create Table
subscriptions	CREATE TABLE `subscriptions` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `website_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `stripe_customer_id` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `stripe_subscription_id` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `status` enum('active','canceled','past_due','trialing','incomplete') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'incomplete',
  `plan` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'base',
  `add_ons` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `current_period_end` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  `created_at` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
  `updated_at` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `idx_website_id` (`website_id`),
  KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`),
  KEY `idx_stripe_subscription_id` (`stripe_subscription_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
